summary: This texture mod replaces 6 main horses (5 rideable) with improved textures and 2 new horse skins. A white horse and dun horse.  I havent ran into the Shadowmere yet, once I do I will do an optional update.
descriptionHtml:
Hi! My name\'s Will. Like my work? Endorse and Follow my personal development blog!
[url=http://shogun3d.com/blog.html]http://shogun3d.com[/url]

Recommended Mod

Convenient Horses - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950
Convenient Horses utilizes my textures and performs a lot more gameplay changes, I would highly recommend you check it out. Alternatively, you may download this mod here for simple skin changes.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(THIS IS A TEXTURE MOD)

This mod replaces 6 main horses (5 rideable) with improved textures and 2 new horse skins.
The mod also enhances the default saddle to a higher resolution saddle.

I basically just scaled up the textures from 512 to 1024 and completed a paint over to reduce artifacting from increased resolution. 
I also increased normal map texture size as well as smoothing it out. 

Once Creation Kit arrives I will be able to do a proper higher resolution bake, so I don\'t have to rely on the base textures provided in game.

1. Carriage Horse Texture Improved
2. Windhelm - Bay Horse Improved
3. Whiterun - Black Horse Improved
4. Riften - Dapple Grey Replaced by DUN Horse
5. Markarth - Pinto Improved
6. Solitude - Palomino Horse replaced by new White Horse

Here are the file listings.
Feel free to switch horses from stable to stable if you want

Horse01.dds = Carriage Horse 
Horse02.dds = White 
Horse03.dds = Dun
Horse04.dds = Black 
Horse05.dds = Pinto
author: Shogun3d

files.name: Enhanced Horse Skins v02
files.changelogHtml:
Reduced file sizes of textures by exporting appropriate compression
The black horse is back in Whiterun! And is now improved.
Replaced Dappley Grey with Dun Horse
